1008.name: Unknown
1008.message:
Miiverse functions are unavailable
to this Nintendo Network ID.
1008.short_description: Your PNID has been permanently banned from Juxtaposition.
1008.long_description:
Your Pretendo Network ID has been permanently banned from Juxtaposition.

This typically occurs because of a violation of the Code of Conduct, or other offenses on the Network or the Discord server.
1008.short_solution: Appeal the ban in the Discord server.
1008.long_solution: Appeal the ban by requesting to speak to a moderator in the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/pretendo).
